I am Eli√¢ Melfior, and this is my personal site.

Who am I?:

I am a software developer located in Joinville, Santa Catarina, Brazil, I am also a christian, and an amateur musician that plays the acoustic guitar.

What are my credentials?

What is my job experience?

I work for SoftExpert in their Enterprise Content Management module, alongside some very professional and capable Software Developers.

What are my skills?
